2763.verse: بَلْ|Nay,|50|61|848$أَتَيْنَـٰهُم|We (have) brought them|184|206|12339$بِٱلْحَقِّ|the truth,|85|107|692$وَإِنَّهُمْ|but indeed, they|130|152|5517$لَكَـٰذِبُونَ|surely, (are) liars.|138|149|5518$

2765.verse: عَـٰلِمِ|Knower|68|91|7838$ٱلْغَيْبِ|(of) the unseen|124|170|2854$وَٱلشَّهَـٰدَةِ|and the witnessed,|147|193|5736$فَتَعَـٰلَىٰ|exalted is He|105|151|7074$عَمَّا|above what|98|121|724$يُشْرِكُونَ|they associate.|123|123|7075$

2768.verse: وَإِنَّا|And indeed We|119|134|682$عَلَىٰٓ|on|63|94|52$أَن|that|48|79|655$نُّرِيَكَ|We show you|109|140|12364$مَا|what|53|84|262$نَعِدُهُمْ|We have promised them|179|194|8170$لَقَـٰدِرُونَ|surely able.|100|100|12243$

2770.verse: وَقُل|And say,|78|99|2709$رَّبِّ|"My Lord!|82|124|7$أَعُوذُ|I seek refuge|107|149|660$بِكَ|in You|61|103|2798$مِنْ|from|50|92|53$هَمَزَٲتِ|(the) suggestions|137|158|12366$ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينِ|(of) the evil ones,|140|140|10323$

2771.verse: وَأَعُوذُ|And I seek refuge|137|156|12367$بِكَ|in You,|66|104|2798$رَبِّ|My Lord!|77|116|7$أَن|Lest|48|86|655$يَحْضُرُونِ|they be present with me."|193|212|12368$

2774.verse: فَإِذَا|So when|77|93|1730$نُفِخَ|is blown|73|105|12373$فِى|in|48|80|89$ٱلصُّورِ|the trumpet|99|131|5734$فَلَآ|then not|77|109|208$أَنسَابَ|(there) will be relationship|193|209|12374$بَيْنَهُمْ|among them|101|139|1056$يَوْمَئِذٍ|that Day,|83|158|3485$وَلَا|and not|71|146|25$يَتَسَآءَلُونَ|will they ask each other.|184|222|12375$

2775.verse: فَمَن|Then (the one) whose|168|192|402$ثَقُلَتْ|(are) heavy|98|146|6258$مَوَٲزِينُهُۥ|his scales,|113|161|6259$فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|then those -|104|152|777$هُمُ|they|50|74|56$ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ|(are) the successful.|159|159|57$

2776.verse: وَمَنْ|But (the one) whose|157|166|1012$خَفَّتْ|(are) light|86|104|6260$مَوَٲزِينُهُۥ|his scales,|113|131|6259$فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|then those|92|110|777$ٱلَّذِينَ|they [who]|94|112|20$خَسِرُوٓاْ|have lost|91|100|5453$أَنفُسَهُمْ|their souls,|93|138|87$فِى|in|48|138|89$جَهَنَّمَ|Hell|69|159|2655$خَـٰلِدُونَ|they (will) abide forever.|184|229|257$

2777.verse: تَلْفَحُ|Will burn|76|83|12376$وُجُوهَهُمُ|their faces|103|116|9696$ٱلنَّارُ|the Fire,|76|89|762$وَهُمْ|and they|79|92|256$فِيهَا|in it|54|67|253$كَـٰلِحُونَ|(will) grin with displaced lips.|211|218|12377$

2763.verse: Rather, We have brought them the truth, and indeed they are liars.

2764.verse: Allah has not taken any son, nor has there ever been with Him any deity. [If there had been], then each deity would have taken what it created, and some of them would have sought to overcome others. Exalted is Allah above what they describe [concerning Him].

2765.verse: [He is] Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, so high is He above what they associate [with Him].

2766.verse: Say, [O Muhammad], "My Lord, if You should show me that which they are promised,

2767.verse: My Lord, then do not place me among the wrongdoing people."

2768.verse: And indeed, We are able to show you what We have promised them.

2769.verse: Repel, by [means of] what is best, [their] evil. We are most knowing of what they describe.

2770.verse: And say, "My Lord, I seek refuge in You from the incitements of the devils,

2771.verse: And I seek refuge in You, my Lord, lest they be present with me."

2772.verse: [For such is the state of the disbelievers], until, when death comes to one of them, he says, "My Lord, send me back

2773.verse: That I might do righteousness in that which I left behind." No! It is only a word he is saying; and behind them is a barrier until the Day they are resurrected.

2774.verse: So when the Horn is blown, no relationship will there be among them that Day, nor will they ask about one another.

2775.verse: And those whose scales are heavy [with good deeds] - it is they who are the successful.

2776.verse: But those whose scales are light - those are the ones who have lost their souls, [being] in Hell, abiding eternally.

2777.verse: The Fire will sear their faces, and they therein will have taut smiles.
